content: {"name": "Beverly Presbyterian Church ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* **Drive-through food pantry**\n* Please use the drive way to the right of the church and follow it to the back of the building. The staff will place the groceries in your car.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.bevpres.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "121 Warren Street East", "address_2": null, "city": "Edgewater Park", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08010", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0659403, "longitude": -74.9105098}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 387-1117", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
